SEARCH
Package io.wcm.devops.conga.tooling.maven.plugin

Class ValidateMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
io.wcm.devops.conga.tooling.maven.plugin.ValidateMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
@Mojo(name="validate", defaultPhase=VALIDATE, requiresProject=true, threadSafe=true, requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE) public class ValidateMojo extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
Validates definitions by trying to parse them with model reader or compile them via handlebars. Validates that the CONGA maven plugin version and CONGA plugin versions match or are newer than those versions used when generating the dependency artifacts.

    • buildDefinitionsJarFile

      protected void buildDefinitionsJarFile() throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException, org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
      Builds a JAR file with all CONGA definitions and resources. This is the main output artefact.
      Throws:
      org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - MOJO execution exception
